configfiles.configfile:
library(ggplot2, quietly=T) library(dada2, quietly=T)
args <- commandArgs(trailingOnly = TRUE) nthreads <- args[1]
files <- c() #for $read in $reads: files <- c(files, '$read.element_identifier') #end for
err <- learnErrors(files, nbases = 10**$nbases, errorEstimationFunction = $advanced.errfoo, multithread = nthreads, randomize = $advanced.randomize, MAX_CONSIST = $advanced.maxconsist, OMEGA_C = $advanced.omegac) saveRDS(err, file='$errors')
plot <- plotErrors(err, obs = $plotopt.obs, err_out = $plotopt.errout, err_in = $plotopt.errin, nominalQ = $plotopt.nominalQ) ggsave('output.pdf', plot, width = 20,height = 15,units = c("cm"))

param.name: reads
param.label: Short read data
param.help: forward or reverse reads should be processed separately

param.name: nbases
param.label: Magnitide of number of bases to use for learning

param.name: maxconsist
param.label: maximum number of times to step through the selfconsistency loop

param.name: omegac
param.label: threshold at which unique sequences inferred to contain errors are corrected
